try:
  import google.colab
  IN_COLAB = True
except:
  IN_COLAB = False

IN_MAIN = __name__ == '__main__'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
if IN_COLAB and IN_MAIN:
    home_dir = '/content/drive/MyDrive/Colab Notebooks/Ecosystems/v3'
if IN_COLAB and IN_MAIN:
    from google.colab import drive
    drive.mount('/content/drive')
    import sys
    sys.path.append(home_dir)
    %cd $home_dir
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
